name: Castlebrainia Virtual Hall of Fame (Castlebrainia)
description:
Welcome to the Castlebrainia Virtual Hall of Fame.

Quiz and tournament winners will be immortalised for all eternity in this virtual museum.  You can also play a short game by selecting 'explore' from the main menu!

Check back after each quiz  for updates!

If you're playing on PC controls are as follows:

Enter - Start

Shift - Select (not used)

Z - A

X - B

A big thank you to everyone who has helped in testing. The game will run on a real Gameboy using a flashcard - the rom can be sent to you, just get in touch!

Comments and feedback welcome.
